page.title: 14SPORTS AND PASTIMES
page.content: There are no purpose built amenities on the resident's doorsteps. The one advantage is the open space enabling adults and children to enjoy gardening(the most popular pastime) fishing,walking, horse-riding, cylcing shooting and birdwatching. Needless to say television viewing fills people's leisure hours, perhaps because it is relaxing after all the outdoor pursuits. Knitting, reading,music, sewing and completing crosswords are restful pastimes. However the more energetic take part in anything from badminton to swimming. There are facilities for these sports in surrounding towns. Games of rugby football and cricket take place in the area, as do yoga and keep-fit classes. The residents enjoy a wide-range of hobbies and make the most of the amenities available.
